detail_desc: Fine-knit knee socks in a soft cotton blend with a high shaft that ends at the knee.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups with ventilating mesh pockets designed to hold breast forms. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fitted nursing dress in cotton-blend jersey with short sleeves and a practical inner top for easier nursing access. The cotton content of the dress is organic.
Leather mules with leather insoles and rubber soles.
Two-strand necklace of thin metal chains with leaf-shaped pendants. Adjustable length 37-45 cm.
Long-sleeved piqué top in fine-knit merino wool with a ribbed collar, button placket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Stand-up collar and a detachable hood with an elasticated front edge. Reflective detail on one sleeve, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton weave containing glittery threads. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Top in cotton jersey with double-layered, short flounced sleeves and high slits held together with ties at the sides.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with an opening at the front with ties at the top and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat, while keeping the jeans in shape. The jeans have a regular waist and skinny legs.
Hat in braided paper straw. Width of brim approx. 10 cm.
Balconette lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool. Wide ribbing around the neckline, and long sleeves with wide, sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
No-show socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elastication around the tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Fitted, calf-length dress with a round neckline, long sleeves, a seam with draped detailing at the waist, and a gently flared skirt.
Trousers in a viscose weave with jacquard-weave stripes. Regular waist and an extended waistband with a hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved jumper in jacquard-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide top in scuba fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and dropped shoulders. Long sleeves with a sewn-on printed woven fabric band on one sleeve and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Straight-cut coat in wool with a detachable drawstring hood, concealed press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Long raglan sleeves, welt side pockets and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in a double-layered cotton weave with a crinkled texture. Round neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and gathered seams at the hips and knees for added volume.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a V-neck and padded cups with removable inserts. Double narrow shoulder straps, a mesh section at the back and wide elastication at the hem. Medium support.
Fully lined, print-patterned swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps and a decorative gather at the top.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.

Baby Exclusive. Two-piece set with a top and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with soft elastication at the waist, and overlocked edges at the hems.

Padded, quilted coat in woven fabric with a detachable hood and stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, flap patch pockets, a drawstring at the waist and soft inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Long, sleeveless dress in a textured, printed viscose weave. Straight cut at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps, a low-cut neckline at the back and inset panels at the sides for extra width at the hem. Two high slits front and back. Unlined.
Gloves in a soft fine knit, one pair containing glittery threads. Ribbed cuffs.

Fine-knit jumper in premium cotton with a ribbed polo-neck collar and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Cropped, boxy top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a V-neck, low dropped shoulder seams and long, wide sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Short 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly with a button at the waist and raw-edge hems.
Cable-knit jumper in a soft cotton blend with a V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Stocking-stitched back.
Set with braces and a bow tie. Adjustable elasticated braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details. Pre-tied bow tie in a dobby weave with an adjustable fastening at the back.
Underwired bra in lace with cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Bat costume with a long-sleeved bodysuit and hat in jersey. Bodysuit with glittery bat wings and fasteners on one shoulder and at the crotch. Hat with a turned-up hem and decorative ears.
Trousers in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a high waist with a wide waistband, and straight wide legs with ribbed hems.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, dropped shoulders, twisted side seams and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Decorative straps at the front, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit containing glittery threads with an embroidered motif on the turned-up hem and faux fur pompoms on top.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist.
Hat in a soft double knit.
Suede biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with a press-stud. Zipped pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and zip down the front. Front pockets and ribbed cuffs. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Blouse in a cotton-blend weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Scalloped trim on the collar and at the hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Fine-knit liner socks designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have elastication around the openings and a silicone trim around the heel for optimum comfort.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend in various colours and designs.
Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar, chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Playsuit in soft viscose jersey with a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets. Inner top with elastication below the bust.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a high waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
V-neck top in a cotton weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and flounces at the front.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Straight-cut dress in a checked viscose weave. Stand-up collar with sewn-on ties inside and concealed buttons down the front. Gathered seam at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and pleats front and back. Unlined.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress with wide, adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.

Ski gloves in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with folded seams, reinforced palm sections and reflective details. Elastication and an adjustable tab and plastic fastener at the wrists (sizes 2-10Y with a hook and loop tab) and soft inner ribbing at the top. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. Thinsulate™ lining. The gloves have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims. Slits at the hem.
Top in soft jersey with a glittery print motif on the front, short sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Short, wide top in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with pompoms, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Long dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and seam under the bust with gathered elastication at the front for a draped effect. Concealed zip at the back, 3/4-length puff sleeves with gathered details at the cuffs, a gently flared skirt and a rounded hem. Lined skirt.
Antiqued metal rings in various sizes and designs.
Tights in a fine knit containing glittery threads. Elasticated waist and soft inside.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Narrow, decorative piping down the legs and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
V-neck T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in lace with chiffon appliqués, a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Gathered seam at the waist, zip at the back and a gently flared skirt. Jersey lining.

Super push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, moulded, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and silicon trim at the back to hold the bra in place. Wide fastening at the back with hooks and eyes.
Long dress in a patterned viscose weave with a frill-trimmed V-neck and covered buttons down the front. Frill-trimmed shoulder straps and a seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back. Unlined.
Ankle-length dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and slits in the sides.
Straight-cut woven blouse with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Open, low dropped shoulders held together by covered buttons and narrow cuffs with a button.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print. Press-studs on one shoulder in sizes 0-12 months.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar and buttons down the front. Slightly longer at the front with ties at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Running jacket in windproof functional fabric with a high stand-up collar with elasticated drawstring, a zip down the front and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Zipped side pockets, a seam at the waist with an elasticated drawstring at the back and reflective details.
Earmuffs in faux fur and imitation suede. Adjustable size.
Blouse in cotton jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Seam with a drawstring at the waist and flounces at the hem.
Short swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Short, straight-cut lace dress with a round neck, opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck, padded shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined.
